name: How To Save The World (Before You Are Born)
name_original: How To Save The World (Before You Are Born)
description:
This game is a criticism of all of the times people have incessantly questioned (from an early age) what I am going to do with my life, who I am and will become, and even how I am going to save the world. 

I've found the worst possible answer you can give is not having an answer, despite this probably being the case for most people most of the time. This is why some choices in the game are actually not playable despite giving the illusion that they are.

The timer represents when it is socially acceptable to have your entire life figured out. This is hopefully ironic considering you're playing as a fetus.

(And in case you hadn't figured it out yet, you cannot actually figure out how to save the world before you are born).

-----

CONTROLS

Use space to begin the game. 

After this, use number keys [1-9] to advance the game.

Press R to restart and Q to quit at any point in the game.

This game uses audio.
